item.title: FaurSound
item.description: FaurSound use computer vision based algorithm to sort & classify noise for Mechatronics. Minimun viable Product(MVP) short demo Production data analysis web app short demo

item.title: TADA
item.description: TADA(Thc Automatic Display Analysis) is a tool for CAL FAS internal use only. it is build to visualize and aggregate the FEA result. See details in https://wangchen9.github.io/tada/

item.title: Who am I
item.description: Who am I? An engineer A data scientist A cat lover A poker player Why engineer? Why a engineer? solve problems, impact on society ! Why data scientist? That’s another vision to view things/problems, and math is so beautiful ! Why cat lover? Remind the kindest things around me ! Why poker? Mental exercise, embrance the variance of life, learn how to invest and deal with risk.
